questiontext.text:
In a farm there are:

  • 3 chicken
  • 4 ducks
  • 5 cows
  • 2 rhynos
  1. How many legs have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%42}
  2. How many horns have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%12}
  3. {1:MRH:%-33.333333333333336%chicken~%-33.333333333333336%ducks~%100.0%cows~%-33.333333333333336%rhynos} have the greatest number of legs in total

In a farm there are:

  • 1 chicken
  • 5 ducks
  • 2 cows
  • 2 rhynos
  1. How many legs have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%28}
  2. How many horns have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%6}
  3. {1:MRH:%-33.333333333333336%chicken~%100.0%ducks~%-33.333333333333336%cows~%-33.333333333333336%rhynos} have the greatest number of legs in total

In a farm there are:

  • 3 chicken
  • 2 ducks
  • 1 cows
  • 4 rhynos
  1. How many legs have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%30}
  2. How many horns have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%6}
  3. {1:MRH:%-33.333333333333336%chicken~%-33.333333333333336%ducks~%-33.333333333333336%cows~%100.0%rhynos} have the greatest number of legs in total

In a farm there are:

  • 1 chicken
  • 1 ducks
  • 2 cows
  • 1 rhynos
  1. How many legs have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%16}
  2. How many horns have they in total? {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%5}
  3. {1:MRH:%-50.0%chicken~%-50.0%ducks~%50.0%cows~%50.0%rhynos} have the greatest number of legs in total
